title: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West grab some sweets and popcorn at the cinema in NYC
text:
They're one of the most powerful celebrity couples.

Yet Kim Kardashian and Kanye West ditched their lavish lifestyle to grab some sweets and popcorn at the AMC cinema in New York City on Friday as they watched his Jesus Is King film.

The entrepreneur, 39, and her rapper husband, 42, couldn't resist packing on the PDA with the Jesus Is King star grabbing his wife's famous peachy posterior.

Snacks: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West ditched their lavish lifestyle to grab some sweets and popcorn at the AMC cinema in New York City on Friday as they watched his Jesus Is King film

Jesus Is King is a film to go alongside the rapper's long-awaited Christian rap album, which was finally released on Friday.

The IMAX movie, which was filmed across the summer, sees Kanye's Sunday Service held at the picturesque Roden Crater with songs from the album performed by a gospel choir.

Kim looked sensational for her date with Kanye, showcasing her jaw-dropping curves in a pair of high-waisted black leather-looking trousers.

She teamed the item of clothing with a matching dragon designed top, which displayed her tiny waist and ample assets.

Peachy: The entrepreneur, 39, and her rapper husband, 42, couldn't resist packing on the PDA with the Jesus Is King star grabbing his wife's famous peachy posterior

Promotion: Jesus Is King is a film to go alongside the rapper's long-awaited Christian rap album, which was finally released on Friday (a still pictured from the film)

Wow: The IMAX movie, which was filmed across the summer, sees Kanye's Sunday Service held at the picturesque Roden Crater with songs from the album performed by a gospel choir

Exciting: The couple decided to stock up on snacks as they watched the highly-anticipated film after weeks of teasing

Kim accessorised her look with a pair of perspex heels, she styled her brunette locks into a tousled hairdo, adding a slick of glamorous make-up.

Meanwhile Kanye cut a more casual figure in baggy jeans, a white T-shirt, an orange hoodie, a gold chain necklace and white trainers.

The duo appeared in good spirits as they went on to enjoy the sights of New York City as they stepped out in the Big Apple.

Wow: Kim looked sensational for her date with Kanye, showcasing her jaw-dropping curves in a pair of high-waisted black leather-looking trousers

Details: She teamed the item of clothing with a matching dragon designed top, which displayed her tiny waist and ample assets

Accessories: Kim accessorised her look with a pair of perspex heels, she styled her brunette locks into a tousled hairdo, adding a slick of glamorous make-up

Casual: Meanwhile Kanye cut a more casual figure in baggy jeans, a white T-shirt, an orange hoodie, a gold chain necklace and white trainers

Happy: The duo appeared in good spirits as they explored NYC and promoted his new Jesus Is King album

While on Thursday Kanye paid Jimmy Kimmel a visit for his show Jimmy Kimmel Live! in Brooklyn.

Their cinema trip comes after Kanye finally released his long-awaited Christian rap album Jesus Is King after weeks of anticipation from fans.

Originally the album was expected to be released a month ago, but the date was pushed back several times before it finally dropped October 25.

Giddy: The duo appeared in good spirits as they went on to enjoy the sights of New York City as they stepped out in the Big Apple

Hooray: Their cinema trip comes after Kanye finally released his long-awaited Christian rap album Jesus Is King after weeks of anticipation from fans

Kanye recently revealed he had asked his collaborators to abstain from sex while working on the album.

'There were times where I was asking people not to have premarital sex while they were working on the album,' Kanye revealed to Zane Lowe on Beats 1 this week.

'I know that’s one where The Shade Room gonna be like: "What you mean, don’t have premarital sex? You better turn that Meg Thee Stallion on right now."

'But seriously there’s times where I went to people that were working on other projects and said: "Could you just work and focus on this?"'

Surprise! On Thursday Kanye paid Jimmy Kimmel a visit for his show Jimmy Kimmel Live! in Brooklyn on
